name: Englo
tagline: Englo - A Projects Software Management and Delivery Tool
body:
### Description
**Englo** is a tool to manage and deliver software projects. Itâ€™s based on **Entando**, an Open Source web application platform, written in Java (see [Entando's Github Repositories] (https://github.com/entando)).

### Features
Englo system includes two modules: ```englo-portal``` and  ```englo-entando-components```; englo-portal is able to run all the services generated from englo-entando-components module, that contains ``` englo ```, ``` basecamp ```, ``` trello ```, ``` github ```, ``` jenkins ``` apps.

### Getting Started
